  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(Currency currency, Map<BigDecimal,Integer> inventoryMaterials)

    • calculateDenominationCounts

      public void calculateDenominationCounts(BigDecimal amount)
      Calculates the amount of denominations needed to pay for a given amount. This method has the possibility of running twice. After the first attempt, if the amount can't be paid for then it will break down a larger denomination and sort through everything after the change is added into the mix.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount to attempt to pay for.

    • calculateBreakdowns

      public Map<BigDecimal,Integer> calculateBreakdowns(BigDecimal amount)

    • breakdown

      public Map<BigDecimal,Integer> breakdown(BigDecimal amount)
      Calculates the number of each denomination required to make up a given monetary amount, using a currency's denomination values.
      Parameters:
      amount - the monetary amount to break down into denominations
      Returns:
      a map of BigDecimal denominations and the number of each denomination required to make up the amount

      public TreeMap<BigDecimal,Integer> getToAdd()

    • getToRemove
